title: Ratzinger Intro #1 Preface a. Marxism, the Impractical God, and the Failure of Christianity
description:
Joseph Ratzinger on why the ethical system of Marxism precipitates ethical suspension and leaves God with nothing to do and how a revolutionary Christ becomes an impractical superfluity. Also, are Christians the opposite of Jordan Peterson?

Google doc containing Ratzinger quotes used in this video can be found here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1pBbAGFJ12qXeTuKP3YAKeHhP-pKCB4CGu1Al8-zXrgs/edit?usp=sharing
How to pronounce my last name: The "c" is silent just to confuse people.
